item.description:
From the East Gate:  Follow Alden Rd, Left on Upper College Pond Rd Follow to the end and take a left on Fearing Pond Rd.  the Charge Pond Rd Gate is on your right.

 

From the West Gate (Carver):  Follow Cranberry Rd and take a left at the Headquarters building onto Halfway Pond Rd.  Take a right onto Upper College Pond Rd. and follow remainder of directions from above.
item.how_to_find_us: Take Upper College Pond Rd. to Fearing Pond Rd. Charge Pond Rd. Gate will be on your right.
item.why: Nice loop around the two ponds and it's pretty easy going. Some trails used and some bike paths used to make up the loop. This hike also takes in a walk through "Cathedral in the Pines" which is pretty cool.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Fearing and Charge Pond Hike
